TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit BitVector32 extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 提供一个简单结构，该结构以 32 位内存存储布尔值和小整数。

span.span: Provides a simple structure that stores Boolean values and small integers in 32 bits of memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 比 用于内部使用的布尔值和小整数更有效。 is more efficient than for Boolean values and small integers that are used internally. 可以无限增长，但它具有类实例所需的内存和性能开销。A can grow indefinitely as needed, but it has the memory and performance overhead that a class instance requires. 相反， 仅使用32位。In contrast, a uses only 32 bits. 可以设置 结构，使其包含用于布尔的小整数或位标志的部分，但不能同时包含两者。A structure can be set up to contain either sections for small integers or bit flags for Booleans, but not both. 是 中的一个窗口，它由可包含 中指定的最大值的连续最小位数组成。A is a window into the and is composed of the smallest number of consecutive bits that can contain the maximum value specified in . 例如，最大值为1的节仅由一位构成，而最大值为5的节由三位组成。For example, a section with a maximum value of 1 is composed of only one bit, whereas a section with a maximum value of 5 is composed of three bits. 可以创建最大值为1的 ，使其用作布尔值，从而使你能够在同一 中存储整数和布尔值。You can create a with a maximum value of 1 to serve as a Boolean, thereby allowing you to store integers and Booleans in the same . 某些成员可用于设置为节的 ，而其他成员可用于作为位标志设置的成员。Some members can be used for a that is set up as sections, while other members can be used for one that is set up as bit flags. 例如， 属性是设置为部分的 的索引器， 属性是设置为位标志的 的索引器。For example, the property is the indexer for a that is set up as sections, and the property is the indexer for a that is set up as bit flags. 创建一系列屏蔽，这些屏蔽可用于访问设置为位标志的 中的单个位。 creates a series of masks that can be used to access individual bits in a that is set up as bit flags. 在设置为节的 上使用掩码可能会导致意外的结果。Using a mask on a that is set up as sections might cause unexpected results. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 作为位标志的集合。The following code example uses a as a collection of bit flags. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_BitFlags#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_BitFlags/CPP/bitvector32_bitflags.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_BitFlags#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_BitFlags/CS/bitvector32_bitflags.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_BitFlags#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_BitFlags/VB/bitvector32_bitflags.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例使用 作为部分的集合。The following code example uses a as a collection of sections. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections/CPP/bitvector32_sections.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections/CS/bitvector32_sections.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections/VB/bitvector32_sections.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int32 CreateMask() cil managed
Public Shared Function CreateMask () As Integer

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 创建一系列屏蔽中的第一个屏蔽，该系列屏蔽可以用于检索作为位标志设置的 中的单个位。

span.span: Creates the first mask in a series of masks that can be used to retrieve individual bits in a that is set up as bit flags.

returns.span: 一个屏蔽，它隔离 中的第一个位标志。

span.span: A mask that isolates the first bit flag in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 `CreateMask()` 创建序列中的第一个掩码，并为所有后续掩码 `CreateMask(int)`。Use `CreateMask()` to create the first mask in a series and `CreateMask(int)` for all subsequent masks. 可以创建多个掩码来引用同一位标志。Multiple masks can be created to refer to the same bit flag. 生成的掩码仅在 中隔离一个位标志。The resulting mask isolates only one bit flag in the . 可以使用按位 "或" 运算组合掩码，以创建在 中隔离多个位标志的掩码。You can combine masks using the bitwise OR operation to create a mask that isolates multiple bit flags in the . 在设置为节的 上使用掩码可能会导致意外的结果。Using a mask on a that is set up as sections might cause unexpected results. 此方法为 O （1）操作。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和使用掩码。The following code example shows how to create and use masks. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks/CPP/bitvector32_createmasks.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks/CS/bitvector32_createmasks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks/VB/bitvector32_createmasks.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在一系列屏蔽中的指定屏蔽后面再创建一个屏蔽，该系列屏蔽可以用于检索作为位标志设置的 中的单个位。

span.span: Creates an additional mask following the specified mask in a series of masks that can be used to retrieve individual bits in a that is set up as bit flags.

returns.span: 一个屏蔽，它隔离 中 所指向的位标志后面的位标志。

span.span: A mask that isolates the bit flag following the one that points to in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 `CreateMask()` 创建序列中的第一个掩码，并为所有后续掩码 `CreateMask(int)`。Use `CreateMask()` to create the first mask in a series and `CreateMask(int)` for all subsequent masks. 可以创建多个掩码来引用同一位标志。Multiple masks can be created to refer to the same bit flag. 生成的掩码仅在 中隔离一个位标志。The resulting mask isolates only one bit flag in the . 可以使用按位 "或" 运算组合掩码，以创建在 中隔离多个位标志的掩码。You can combine masks using the bitwise OR operation to create a mask that isolates multiple bit flags in the . 在设置为节的 上使用掩码可能会导致意外的结果。Using a mask on a that is set up as sections might cause unexpected results. 此方法为 O （1）操作。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和使用掩码。The following code example shows how to create and use masks. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks/CPP/bitvector32_createmasks.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks/CS/bitvector32_createmasks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks/VB/bitvector32_createmasks.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 中的一个窗口，它由可包含 中指定的最大值的连续最小位数组成。A is a window into the and is composed of the smallest number of consecutive bits that can contain the maximum value specified in . 例如，最大值为1的节仅由一位构成，而最大值为5的节由三位组成。For example, a section with a maximum value of 1 is composed of only one bit, whereas a section with a maximum value of 5 is composed of three bits. 可以创建最大值为1的 ，使其用作布尔值，从而使你能够在同一 中存储整数和布尔值。You can create a with a maximum value of 1 to serve as a Boolean, thereby allowing you to store integers and Booleans in the same . 如果 中已经存在节，则仍可访问这些部分;但是，重叠部分可能会导致意外的结果。If sections already exist in the , those sections are still accessible; however, overlapping sections might cause unexpected results. 此方法为 O （1）操作。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 作为部分的集合。The following code example uses a as a collection of sections. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections/CPP/bitvector32_sections.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections/CS/bitvector32_sections.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections/VB/bitvector32_sections.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Section] 属性是设置为部分的 的索引器， [int] 属性是设置为位标志的 的索引器。The [Section] property is the indexer for a that is set up as sections, and the [int] property is the indexer for a that is set up as bit flags. 是 中的一个窗口，它由可包含 中指定的最大值的连续最小位数组成。A is a window into the and is composed of the smallest number of consecutive bits that can contain the maximum value specified in . 例如，最大值为1的节仅由一位构成，而最大值为5的节由三位组成。For example, a section with a maximum value of 1 is composed of only one bit, whereas a section with a maximum value of 5 is composed of three bits. 可以创建最大值为1的 ，使其用作布尔值，从而使你能够在同一 中存储整数和布尔值。You can create a with a maximum value of 1 to serve as a Boolean, thereby allowing you to store integers and Booleans in the same . 该C#语言使用[this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this)关键字来定义索引器，而不是实现 属性。The C# language uses the [this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为[默认属性](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/default)，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a [default property](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/default), which provides the same indexing functionality. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O （1）;设置属性也是 O （1）操作。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is also an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Section] 属性是设置为部分的 的索引器， [int] 属性是设置为位标志的 的索引器。The [Section] property is the indexer for a that is set up as sections, and the [int] property is the indexer for a that is set up as bit flags. 在设置为节的 上使用此属性可能会导致意外的结果。Using this property on a that is set up as sections might cause unexpected results. 该C#语言使用[this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this)关键字来定义索引器，而不是实现 属性。The C# language uses the [this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为[默认属性](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/default)，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a [default property](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/default), which provides the same indexing functionality. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O （1）;设置属性也是 O （1）操作。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is also an O(1) operation.
